languages.text: "Вершить суд — чрезвычайно ответственная работа, требующая глубокого знания Лекс Империалис. Сегодня вы коснулись лишь малой толики сего священнодействия. Благодарю, что поучаствовали. А теперь мне пора вернуться к исполнению своих обязанностей. Всего хорошего".

traits.locale_text: "Вершить суд — чрезвычайно ответственная работа, требующая глубокого знания Лекс Империалис. Сегодня вы коснулись лишь малой толики сего священнодействия. Благодарю, что поучаствовали. А теперь мне пора вернуться к исполнению своих обязанностей. Всего хорошего".
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: "Delivering justice is incredibly demanding work that requires in-depth knowledge of the Lex Imperialis. Today, you merely touched upon a small fragment of this sacrament. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to return to my duties. Good day to you."
languages.original_text: "Вершить суд — чрезвычайно ответственная работа, требующая глубокого знания Лекс Империалис. Сегодня вы коснулись лишь малой толики сего священнодействия. Благодарю, что поучаствовали. А теперь мне пора вернуться к исполнению своих обязанностей. Всего хорошего".

traits.locale_text: "Delivering justice is incredibly demanding work that requires in-depth knowledge of the Lex Imperialis. Today, you merely touched upon a small fragment of this sacrament. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to return to my duties. Good day to you."

"Delivering justice in a courtroom is dirty and difficult work that comes with a great responsibility. I was not expecting you to understand. Thank you for your participation, and now it is time for me to get to work."

"Delivering justice in a courtroom is dirty and difficult work that comes with a great responsibility. I was not expecting you to understand. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to get back to work."

"Delivering justice in a courtroom is dirty and difficult work that comes with a great responsibility. I was not expecting you to understand. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to get back to work."

"Delivering justice is incredibly demanding work that requires in-depth knowledge of the Lex Imperialis. Today, you merely touched upon a small fragment of this sacrament. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to return to my duties. Good day to you."

languages.text: "Recht zu sprechen, ist eine unglaublich anspruchsvolle Tätigkeit, die umfassende Kenntnisse des Lex Imperia erfordert. Ihr habt heute nur einen winzigen Bruchteil dieses Sakraments gestreift. Danke für Eure Teilnahme. Und nun wird es für mich Zeit, mich wieder meinen Pflichten zuzuwenden. Guten Tag."
languages.original_text: "Delivering justice is incredibly demanding work that requires in-depth knowledge of the Lex Imperialis. Today, you merely touched upon a small fragment of this sacrament. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to return to my duties. Good day to you."

traits.locale_text: "Recht zu sprechen, ist eine unglaublich anspruchsvolle Tätigkeit, die umfassende Kenntnisse des Lex Imperia erfordert. Ihr habt heute nur einen winzigen Bruchteil dieses Sakraments gestreift. Danke für Eure Teilnahme. Und nun wird es für mich Zeit, mich wieder meinen Pflichten zuzuwenden. Guten Tag."

languages.text: « Rendre la justice est un travail incroyablement exigeant qui requiert une connaissance approfondie de la Lex Imperialis. Aujourd'hui, vous n'avez fait qu'effleurer un petit fragment de ce sacrement. Je vous remercie de votre participation. Et maintenant, il est temps pour moi de retourner à mes fonctions. Bonne journée à vous. »
languages.original_text: "Delivering justice is incredibly demanding work that requires in-depth knowledge of the Lex Imperialis. Today, you merely touched upon a small fragment of this sacrament. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to return to my duties. Good day to you."

traits.locale_text: « Rendre la justice est un travail incroyablement exigeant qui requiert une connaissance approfondie de la Lex Imperialis. Aujourd'hui, vous n'avez fait qu'effleurer un petit fragment de ce sacrement. Je vous remercie de votre participation. Et maintenant, il est temps pour moi de retourner à mes fonctions. Bonne journée à vous. »

languages.text: “伸张正义是一项极其艰巨的工作，需要深入了解《帝国法典》的众多规程。今天，您仅仅是触及了这个神圣职责的一小部分。非常感谢您的参与，如今我得回去继续履行职责了，祝您一切顺利。”
languages.original_text: "Delivering justice is incredibly demanding work that requires in-depth knowledge of the Lex Imperialis. Today, you merely touched upon a small fragment of this sacrament. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to return to my duties. Good day to you."

traits.locale_text: “伸张正义是一项极其艰巨的工作，需要深入了解《帝国法典》的众多规程。今天，您仅仅是触及了这个神圣职责的一小部分。非常感谢您的参与，如今我得回去继续履行职责了，祝您一切顺利。”

languages.text: «Impartir justicia es una tarea extremadamente exigente y requiere un conocimiento en profundidad de la Lex Imperialis. Hoy, apenas ha tocado un pequeño fragmento de este sacramento. Gracias por su participación. Ahora, es momento de que vuelva a mis deberes. Le deseo un buen día».
languages.original_text: "Delivering justice is incredibly demanding work that requires in-depth knowledge of the Lex Imperialis. Today, you merely touched upon a small fragment of this sacrament. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to return to my duties. Good day to you."

traits.locale_text: «Impartir justicia es una tarea extremadamente exigente y requiere un conocimiento en profundidad de la Lex Imperialis. Hoy, apenas ha tocado un pequeño fragmento de este sacramento. Gracias por su participación. Ahora, es momento de que vuelva a mis deberes. Le deseo un buen día».

languages.text: 「正義を執行するということは、レックス・インペリアに関する深い知識を必要とする非常に厳しい仕事です。今日、あなたが触れたのは、この聖儀のほんの一部にすぎません。ご参加いただき、感謝いたします。そして今、私は職務に戻らなければなりません。それでは、ごきげんよう」
languages.original_text: "Delivering justice is incredibly demanding work that requires in-depth knowledge of the Lex Imperialis. Today, you merely touched upon a small fragment of this sacrament. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to return to my duties. Good day to you."

traits.locale_text: 「正義を執行するということは、レックス・インペリアに関する深い知識を必要とする非常に厳しい仕事です。今日、あなたが触れたのは、この聖儀のほんの一部にすぎません。ご参加いただき、感謝いたします。そして今、私は職務に戻らなければなりません。それでは、ごきげんよう」

languages.text: "Adalet dağıtmak, Lex İmperialis'e derinlemesine hâkim olmayı gerektiren zorlu bir iştir. Bugün bu kutsallığın sadece küçük bir parçasına değindiniz. Katılımınız için teşekkür ederim. Artık işimin başına dönmeliyim. Size iyi günler dilerim."
languages.original_text: "Delivering justice is incredibly demanding work that requires in-depth knowledge of the Lex Imperialis. Today, you merely touched upon a small fragment of this sacrament. Thank you for your participation. And now, it is time for me to return to my duties. Good day to you."

traits.locale_text: "Adalet dağıtmak, Lex İmperialis'e derinlemesine hâkim olmayı gerektiren zorlu bir iştir. Bugün bu kutsallığın sadece küçük bir parçasına değindiniz. Katılımınız için teşekkür ederim. Artık işimin başına dönmeliyim. Size iyi günler dilerim."
